title: Are You Still Down
description: To follow your dreams is one amazing thing, but to find them figure out what your heart and mind are telling you can be a confusing process. Throw in that mix young love and you have a melting pot of drama. Young love can be one of the most powerful forces on earth. It’s fast-paced, exhilarating, challenging, and above all completely passionate. No matter the will and resistance to its power once your heart is captured you’re caught up at full force. That is exactly where you find Taylor and Brandon. Taylor does not consider love as part of her life plan. She considers the things she has always had a passion for and by any means necessary has planned to achieve them. Still, when love chooses to enter her world she doesn't shy away from it, she gives full force to its power, but finds a way to keep her own goals and dreams intact.Like all sensations one of the major powers of young love is it's tragedy and when tragedy strikes her more than once she faces the biggest dilemma of her life, take the challenge of the unknown or turn to the comfort of the known.
author: Paulette L. Jones
